name: xeus
description: QuantStack C++ implementation of Jupyter kernel protocol

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: libzmq
dependencies.description: The ZMQ networking/concurrency library and core API

dependencies.name: cryptopp
dependencies.description:
Crypto++ is an open-source C++ library of cryptographic schemes. The
library supports a number of different cryptography algorithms,
including authenticated encryption schemes (GCM, CCM), hash functions
(SHA-1, SHA2), public-key encryption (RSA, DSA), and a few
obsolete/historical encryption algorithms (MD5, Panama).

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.

dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description:
OSSP uuid is a ISO-C:1999 application programming interface (API) and
corresponding command line interface (CLI) for the generation of DCE
1.1, ISO/IEC 11578:1996 and RFC 4122 compliant Universally Unique
Identifier (UUID).

dependent_to.name: xwidgets
dependent_to.description: A C++ backend for Jupyter interactive widgets
